result.execSummary:
The defendant Alberto Pelaez Garcia was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Sauk County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:

Consecutive to: any other sentence

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Alberto Pelaez Garcia in court with attorney Andrew I. Martinez and interpreter Alejandra K.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Martinez states matter is resolved and states recs.  State agrees.  Atty Martinez enters NC plea.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on plea/accepts/finds guilty.  Atty Martinez makes argument on behalf of DE.  DE makes brief statement.  Court sentences.

15CM9
Ct 1:  NC
5 days jail w/huber consecutive to any other sentence
To commence on or before 9/18/2015 at 7:00 pm
1 day sentence credit
May serve in Green Co if accepted 
$443.00 to be paid w/in 60 days or set up payment plan

14TR9200 - OAS - $200.50 to be paid w/in 60 days or set up payment plan

14TR9199 and 14TR9201 are dismissed
Return date at 07-23-2015 01:00 pm

Attorney Andrew I. Martinez in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Martinez has had no contact by defendant.  Employer contacted court stating he would not be in for court today.  Attorney Martinez received no contact and does request a reset since there has been some contact to the court re: today's date.  State does not object.  Court allows reset.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for July 23, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
